name: Xochitl
bio: A newbie demon hunter living in the Pride Region. She doesn't have any goals for the future and treats demon hunting as simply a side hustle.

name: Glitch
bio: A veteran demon hunter living in the Pride Region. He has skills in creating technology capable of controlling demons.

name: Hana
bio: A young shrine maiden working at the shrines overseeing the monthly tributes. Her responsibilities include ensuring the tributes’ 'cleanliness' before each full moon.

name: Akito
bio: A courier who practices archery to send messages in the region. He secretly wants to dismantle the tribute system and rebel against the demons.

name: Freesia
bio: A obedient girl with a love for fashion.

name: Dash
bio: A boy bred with rabbit ears. Energetic and tends to run off often, much to the dismay of his guardian demon.

name: Linnea
bio: A girl with a shaman lineage. She is proud to be descendant of the first native chief.

name: Kai
bio: A shy boy who isn’t confident in his skills. Likes animals.

name: Odin
bio: Contrary to the hostile environment of the Wrath region, he takes care of children who lost their homes from the demons.

name: Lime
bio: A short-tempered, idealistic girl who strives to be the strongest

name: Epsilon
bio: A half demon-half human professor studying the supernatural and is well respected among his students.

name: Rose
bio: A witch who is extremely devout to demons to the point of blind worship.
